quotes.quote: You are what you choose to be today. Not what you've chosen to be before.
Never too old, never too bad, never too late, never too sick to start from scratch once again.
God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
Great minds have purposes others have wishes.
If you truly want to become a better you, it is imperative that you learn to feel good about yourself.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
Let the dead Past bury its dead!
Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.
Forget everything you've done. Start over.
Maybe the new me will be different.
Today is a new day. Even if you were wrong yesterday, you can get it right today.
I wake up every morning and I surprise myself. I wake up to a new me.
And there's always a way to begin with.
Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
Today is the start of a new adventure. New challenges to face, new memories to make, and new obstacles to overcome.

Renew, release, let go. Yesterdays gone. Theres nothing you can do to bring it back. You cant shouldve done something. You can only do something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!
Never be afraid to to start over because it's a new chance to rebuild what you want.
